title: OPEC Secretary General holds an interactive session with students at ADIPEC 2021
description: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, 17 November 2021--OPEC Secretary General, HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, today hosted a special interactive session to engage with young students as part of the Organizationâ€™s participation at ADIPEC 2021 in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates (UAE).
